sections.Situation: One morning, while having breakfast at the Café Poirot along with Kogoro and Ran, Conan notices a strange, glum-looking customer sitting at a table, eating ham sandwiches instead of the regular breakfast selection and without having consulted the menu, which indicates him as a regular client. What makes the guest so peculiar is that he has his eyes constantly fixed on Tooru Amuro while he is working. While discussing about the mysterious customer's real identity, Conan asks Rei about his status in the Black Organization, as well as the Public Security Bureau.
sections.Resolution: The mysterious man is revealed by Conan to be a baker. He has been stalking Rei in order to find out how to replicate the ham sandwiches Rei prepares for the Poirot customers, after he had once had breakfast at the café after hearing about how the sandwiches' quality had drastically improved lately, and found them extremely delicious. However, despite all efforts, he has not been able to replicate their unique flavor on his own. Upon learning the motive, and much to the surprise of the Detective Boys, Rei happily teaches the man his unique method of making sandwiches.
